author: bsunanda
body: Many parts of the trigger code and AlCa codes are modified and they are tested in 7_5_X and also with 7_4_X it passes the runTheMatrix.py with 10 10 9 7 6 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 0 failed
title: bsunanda:Run2-alca9 Backport PRs from 7_5 to handle calibration trigger and AlCa Reco jobs for HCAL
